description: EPILEPSY WARNING This is a short game called 586 that was on my brother's laptop. He gave the laptop to me because he is moving to the USA for college. I assume he made this because he had some interest in coding. Idk what genre to pick so no genre will do. I have no idea who the picture is but it was also in the same folder I found the game in. There are both windows and mac versions but this game was probably made on a mac because it was on his macbook. It is fullscreen so make sure you know how to force quit before playing.
